title: Cake Studio
description: Cake Studio is an interactive web application that allows users to design and customize their own virtual cakes. Users can choose from a variety of cake shapes, flavors, and decorations to create their perfect cake. The application features a user-friendly interface with drag-and-drop functionality, allowing users to easily add and arrange different elements on their cake. Cake Studio also includes a preview mode where users can see their cake in 3D before finalizing their design.
tech: Web Audio API for sound effects and music
Local Storage or IndexedDB for saving user designs and preferences
